spec.name: SLCEE-2023-PC Arena
spec.title: SLCEE-2023-PC Arena
spec.description:
**SAP Labs CEE Hub Programming Competition 2023 Arena server**.

You can find more information about the game and the competititon rules at [github/SLH_SPC_2022](https://github.com/afarago/SLH_SPC_2022).  
For a test run, you can use the crash test dummy user `000000000000000000000000/dummypass`.  
*Note: All the APIs expect and return application/json*.

tags.name: Game
tags.description: Game related operations to create/query a match or execute a user action

tags.name: GameAdmin
tags.description: Game related operations to create/query/terminate a match
